questions.questionText: Who has the most wins in NASCAR Cup Series history?
questions.explanation: Nicknamed "The King," Richard Petty captured an impressive 200 NASCAR Cup Series wins during his career.

questions.questionText: What is the oldest active NASCAR Cup Series team?
questions.explanation: Founded in 1950 by Glen Wood, Wood Brothers Racing has participated in more than 1700 NASCAR Cup Series races.

questions.questionText: Who won the inaugural NASCAR Cup Series race in Chicago?
questions.explanation: Gisbergen made history when he won his first NASCAR Cup Series race in his debut, making him the first one to do so in 60 years since Johnny Rutherford.

questions.questionText: Who has won the most consecutive NASCAR Cup Series championships?
questions.explanation: Johnson, a NASCAR Hall of Famer, who still races part time for his Legacy Motor Club team, won a record five consecutive NASCAR Cup Series championships from 2006-2010.

questions.questionText: Which driver won the inaugural NASCAR Xfinity Series race in Chicago?
questions.explanation: Cole Custer won the 2023 NASCAR Xfinity Series race in Chicago before going on to win the NASCAR Xfinity Series Championship later that year.
